projectGridLines.stationName: Genpact AIML Data Scientist - AI Practice, Bengaluru
projectGridLines.title: Project 1  Title: AIML Data Scientist
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: AIML Data Scientist


Description: Data Scientist is expected to leverage his/her expertise to translate the customer’s business need into a techno-analytic problem and appropriately work with the team of specialists to bring large scale AI solution to fruition.


Skill sets: 

Exposure to Statistical Toolkits such as R, Weka, Python, Azure ML, AWS Sagemaker

• Very good Python/R programming skills. Java programming skills a plus

• Building, deploying and measuring predictive/prescriptive analytics models (i.e. SVM,

decision tree, clustering, logistic regression, linear and non-linear regression, ANN,

CNN, RNN)

• Deep learning frameworks such as Tensor Flow, Keras, PyTorch, Theano

• Tooling frameworks like PyCharm or Jupyter


Expected learning:


Specific courses required for project execution: 


Academic course work in various levels of math dealing with probability and statistics,

Bayesian networking and graphical modeling, and coverage of deep learning and neural

networks and cognitive science, One or more assignments completed in designing, building, training and deploying a model for a given area.
